extendedInfo.description: Launch Sale!!! 50% off!!The cult-hit Super Mega Worm has arrived on Google Play Store!!! Mother Earth is on the brink of extinction and has released her last defense, the Great Death Worm, Wojira. Wojira is on a revenge mission to destroy all the Human parasites. Crawl and eat your way through waves of humans and their robots of destruction. Grow and evolve into the ultimate weapon of destruction. You are the last line of defense, can you save the world? Features - Super fun, fast and furious Gameplay - Awesome Retro Art Style - 24 Action Packed Levels - 2 Different Game Modes - 3 Destructive Super Abilities - 2 Different Control Schemes - 20 Delicious Items to Eat - Google Play Services (Leaderboards and Achievements)- Tablet Support For a demo version, please try our Super Mega Worm Vs Santa 2:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.deceasedpixel.smwxmas2__________________________________________ Reviews: "Download this app immediately, or forever live in fear of the almighty Wojira."http://www.lifeofandroid.com/apps_review_detail/super-mega-worm/9/10- lifeofandroid.com"Super Mega Worm is an addictive arcade game, I had a hard time putting it down. This Android game is worth the buck as youâll spend hours of fun."http://gamewoof.com/quick-review/super-mega-worm-wreaks-havoc-from-the-ground-up/4/5- gamewoof.com"For those who havenât played Super Mega Worm should give this game a try. Itâs a game that has classic looks and sound. And it is very easy to get into, and really fun to play."http://www.androidentity.com/super-mega-worm-review- androidentity.com

reviews.title: Pretty fun
reviews.comment: Spent many, many hours on this game back when I had my iPhone. Glad to see it on Android... But why\'d it take so long!? And calm down with the \"swarm\

reviews.title: Really Fun Game
reviews.comment: 8 bit graphics, controls are simple and easy. Sound track and FX are good. I found this game to be a whole lotta fun for a 0.99cent price point. The longer I played it the better I got at bouncing the worm off objects to get airborne to get bigger points. I highly recommend this game!
reviews.author: Mark Jordan

reviews.title: Endless hours of fun!
reviews.comment: Played this game on the iPod when it came out and couldn\'t be more excited to see it on android now.
reviews.author: Domenic Longarini

reviews.title: Wonderfully wormy.
reviews.comment: This 8-bit worm-em-up is inventive, funny and lots of fun to play.
reviews.author: David Christian

reviews.comment: Fun game, plays great on my nexus 7. I feel the direction controls need to be bigger, or at least have the ability to make them bigger. I\'m sure a controller would make this game 5 stars, but I\'m limited to touch screen, and controls really make or break games like this.
reviews.author: Travis Buckner

reviews.title: Excellent game!
reviews.comment: Once you get the fire spit it\'s all over.  Needs nore upgrades. Also more momentum from sky to earth.
reviews.author: Litruv Boonzy

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Worth the money for sure :)
reviews.author: Mitchell Leeds

reviews.title: Upgrades
reviews.comment: More upgrades for the worm would be good
reviews.author: Kornelius bethea

reviews.title: Great game to play when bored! Even better customer service.
reviews.comment: The leader board was stuck at a certain score and I let the creator know and he replied and fixes it so quickly! You guys bare awesome!
reviews.author: arber demiri

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: Been waiting for this game to come to Android, used to play on iPod. Yes!
reviews.author: Peter M

reviews.title: Good controls good game
reviews.comment: Buy it
reviews.author: Diego Cruz

reviews.title: Glad to have this game on android!
reviews.comment: Love this game on iOS and Mac... Same great fun!
reviews.author: Brion Vibber

reviews.title: Refund.
reviews.comment: Controls are too sensitive and the two way option is even worse. Let me know when you give us a sensitivity setting and I will buy.
reviews.author: Paul Price

reviews.title: Love this game.
reviews.comment: Played it on my old iPhone and loved it. Glad to set it on android now.
reviews.author: Henry Woods

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love the Google Play Games support :D
reviews.author: Mason Juarez

reviews.title: Brill game
reviews.comment: 5 star fun!!! No problems so far!
reviews.author: Dominic Parkhurst

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: This game is so fun but it always crashes I will give 5 stars if u fix it

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Very easy to control and very fun to play
reviews.author: Michael Stothard

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: No IOS devices in our house so this is new to me.

reviews.title: Always my favorite game on iOS
reviews.comment: I always played this on my iPod, now it\'s on Android!
